embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201603301412

3.30.16  2:12 pm   could you tell me why you're not revealing what your current project in a way that doesn't reveal the current project, or is that impossible?

     i am nervous about whether anyone will care about this project. the true fans will probably love it, but if i were to advertise this project as the Next Big Thing, Available at Book Stores and Museums Across the Country, Bring Your Kids if you are Looking For Something Neat To Do, people might be extremely confused and disappointed when they see what it actually is i've been working on. however, i think the true fans will love it and they have probably been waiting for this for a while. the release of this project will be totally stealth, kind of like my website was when it first came out.
     i am anxious to finish this thing, because the project After that, IS something that i would want to be "sent to stores" so to speak
original_html: 3.31.19  3:46 pm   3.30.16  2:12 pm What "project" was this question referring to?

answers_original.html:
3.30.16  2:12 pm   could you tell me why you're not revealing what your current project in a way that doesn't reveal the current project, or is that impossible?

     i am nervous about whether anyone will care about this project. the true fans will probably love it, but if i were to advertise this project as the Next Big Thing, Available at Book Stores and Museums Across the Country, Bring Your Kids if you are Looking For Something Neat To Do, people might be extremely confused and disappointed when they see what it actually is i've been working on. however, i think the true fans will love it and they have probably been waiting for this for a while. the release of this project will be totally stealth, kind of like my website was when it first came out.
     i am anxious to finish this thing, because the project After that, IS something that i would want to be "sent to stores" so to speak
